name: Fresquisimo-API-REST
description: *Node.js API-REST project with CRUD operations* ## Requirements - The application will be applied entirely in Javascript, both in the backend and in the frontend, being able to also use HTML, CSS and related frameworks that are considered appropriate. - The application will allow the 4 CRUD operations on the database. - The database must be MongoDB and have at least 2 schemas.
author: deg42
